alert.note: Alert for Lincoln (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 03 at 3:46PM MDT until June 03 at 4:45PM MDT by NWS Boulder
info.description: The National Weather Service in Denver Colorado has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Lincoln County in east central Colorado... * Until 445 PM MDT. * At 346 PM MDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 9 miles north of Boyero to 9 miles northeast of Karval to 6 miles south of Forder, or along a line extending from 18 miles southwest of Flagler to 69 miles southwest of Burlington to 41 miles north of North La Junta, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Hail damage to vehicles is expected. * Severe thunderstorms will be near... Wild Horse Point around 405 PM MDT. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
